member.name: T:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions
member.summary: Provides various extension methods to Syste.ToString

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToMd5Hash(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a string input to a byte array and compute the hash

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToBoolean(System.String)
member.summary: Parse a string input to boolean (when the string has a boolean value)

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToShort(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the string representation of a number to its 16-bit signed integer equivalent. If the conversion failed the return value is null.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToInteger(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the string representation of a number to its 32-bit signed integer equivalent. If the conversion failed the return value is null.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToLong(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the string representation of a number to its 64-bit signed integer equivalent. If the conversion failed the return value is null.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToDateTime(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the specified string representation of a date and time to its System.DateTime equivalent and returns a value that indicates whether the conversion succeeded.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.CapitalizeFirstLetter(System.String)
member.summary: Capitalize the first letter of a string passed as input
member.returns: returns a string with its first letter capitalized

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.GetStringBetween(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Accept a string input and returns the string between two given strings. Returns empty string if either the start or the end strings cannot be found. Start and end string values are not included in the result.
member.param: >The string value that indicates the start of the extraction.
The string value that indicates the end of the extraction.
The index when start performing the extraction. The default value is 0

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ConvertCyrillicToLatinLetters(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the cyrillic letters of a string using their phonetic rapresentations in latin form.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ConvertLatinToCyrillicKeyboard(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the latin letters of a string to their equivalent in a standard cyrillic layout keyboard.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToValidUsername(System.String)
member.summary: Replaces any non latin letters to their phonetic latin equivalent and removes any non-alphanumeric characters excluding "_" and ".".

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToValidLatinFileName(System.String)
member.summary: Replaces any non latin letters to their phonetic latin equivalent and removes any non-alphanumeric characters excluding "_" , "." and "-".

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.GetFirstCharacters(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Return a substring which starts at index 0 and ends at index "charsCount". If charsCount > the string's length, returns the entire string
member.param: number of characters to be extracted

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.GetFileExtension(System.String)
member.summary: Given the name of a file, returns its extension
member.param: string: the name of the file

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToContentType(System.String)
member.summary: Given a file extention, returns the content type of the file,
member.returns: the type content of the file

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToByteArray(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the curret string to an array of integers, representing the byte values in decimal of its internal memory representation.
